infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to analyze your skin and detect emotions for personalized wellness coaching.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone for voice interactions with your wellness coach.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app uses speech recognition to understand your voice commands and provide personalized wellness coaching.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app accesses health data to provide personalized wellness recommendations.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app writes wellness data to Apple Health for comprehensive health tracking.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your calendar to sync wellness activities and reminders.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to your reminders to set wellness activity notifications.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Wellness Coach to access your camera for skin analysis and emotion detection.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Wellness Coach to save analysis photos to your photo library.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Wellness Coach to save analysis results.

plugins.calendarPermission: Allow Wellness Coach to sync wellness activities with your calendar.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Wellness Coach to access your microphone for voice interactions.
plugins.speechRecognitionPermission: Allow Wellness Coach to use speech recognition for voice commands.
